articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Splatoon 3 Nintendo Direct: How to watch and when it starts
articles.description: A new Nintendo Direct will dive deeply into Splatoon 3, the Nintendo Switch sequel coming in September. Watch the new Splatoon 3 Direct here, on Wednesday, Aug. 10, starting at 9 a.m. EDT.
articles.content: Dive into the world of Splatoon for 30 minutes

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Twitch streaming star Keffals swatted and arrested in her home
articles.description: Keffals is a popular Twitch streamer who was swatted and arrested on Aug. 5 in a transphobic hate crime. The streamer is now asking that people help support her in collecting funds to relocate and recoup losses from the traumatic event.
articles.content: Instead of the police helping me, they terrorized me

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Overwatch Anniversary Remix Vol. 3 skins revealed
articles.description: Blizzard gives Overwatch fans new skins fo D.Va, Genji, Tracer, Soldier:76, Baptiste, and Pharah for Overwatch Anniversary Remix Vol. 3.
articles.content: Overwatchs third and final Anniversary Remix event launches Tuesday, bringing back past Arcade brawls and seasonal events as Blizzard plans to send off the original game. Overwatch Anniversary Remix … [+1046 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Overwatch loot box sales ending in August with Anniversary Remix Vol. 3
articles.description: Blizzard is ending sales of loot boxes in Overwatch on Aug. 31, ahead of Overwatch 2’s free-to-play launch in October.
articles.content: Overwatchs latest Anniversary Remix event the games third and final such event kicks off Tuesday, giving seasoned fans of Blizzards hero shooter another batch of skins and a chance to revisit limited… [+7557 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Netflix’s Do Revenge is a dark high-school comedy with Maya Hawke and Camila Mendes
articles.description: Maya Hawke and Camila Mendes star in Do Revenge, a Heathers-like dark comedy from the director of Someone Great. The movie, which has a new trailer, hits Netflix on Sept. 16.

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Gen Con 2022: New miniatures for The Witcher tabletop RPG are hot AF
articles.description: Monster Fight Club introduced a new line of miniatures for The Witcher tabletop RPG. Monster Fight Club’s new line debuted last week at Gen Con, and R. Talsorian was selling them at its booth.
articles.content: A new line of miniatures for The Witcher tabletop role-playing game debuted last week at Gen Con. They include Geralt of Rivia, Yennefer, and the bard Dandelion better known as Jaskier to fans of the… [+2140 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Indie fighting game Nidhogg 2 getting an arcade cabinet
articles.description: Indie fighting game Nidhogg 2 is getting an arcade cabinet, a partnership between developer Messhof and DSM Arcade.
articles.content: The indie fighting game is getting an arcade cabinet

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Pokémon: Arceus Chronicles is a new Pokémon special coming to Netflix
articles.description: Pokémon: Arceus Chronicles is a new Pokémon special coming to Netflix on Sept. 23 2022. The special will star Ash, Pikachu, Goh, and old friends like Brock, Dawn, and Cynthia as the group takes on a new adventure in the Sinnoh region.
articles.content: Ash and friends return to Sinnoh this fall

articles.author: Pete Volk
articles.title: Udyr rework ability kit, new ultimate revealed for League of Legends
articles.description: League of Legends patch 12.16 will bring Udyr’s rework to the game. Riot gives us our first look at the Spirit Walker’s new kit.
articles.content: Theres a new Udyr in town. After many, many years of players clamoring for an update to one of League of Legends oldest champions, the Spirit Walker, is getting a new look on The Rift as well as a ne… [+2486 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Pokémon Go Fest 2022 finale event dates, raids, and exclusives announced
articles.description: Niantic’s finale event for Pokémon Go Fest 2022 will take place on Aug. 27, giving players access to all four existing Ultra Beasts, and new variants Land Forme Shaymin, Shiny Munna, and Shiny Unown N and X.
articles.content: Pokémon Go Fest 2022, the event that kicked off globally in June and played out locally in Berlin, Seattle, and Sapporo, will come to a conclusion (globally, again) on Saturday, Aug. 27. Pokémon Go p… [+2540 chars]
